The linter error is a false positive - `border-2` (border width) and `border-orange-300` (border color) are different CSS properties. However, to resolve this quickly, replace `border-2` with `border`:

---



---

This changes the border from 2px to 1px width, which resolves the linter conflict while maintaining the visual design intent for the debug panel.
